strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: All formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all Space Wolves detachments and Aircraft formations. Pack Mentality applies to all Core and Elite Packs.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army of Space Marines from the Space Wolves Chapter.

formations.name: Hunting Pack
formations.units: One Wolf Lord Captain, six Grey Hunter Tacticals plus transport
extraUnits: Replace two Grey Hunter Tacticals with Long Fang Devastators: 50 points

formations.name: Blood Claw Assault Pack
extraUnits: Add 'plus transport' to the formation: 25 points

sections.name: Space Wolf Elite Packs
sections.description: One Elite Pack may be taken per Hunting Pack (note: not one per Core Pack)

formations.name: Long Fang Pack
formations.units: One Wolf Lord Captain, four Long Fang Devastators

formations.name: Thunderwolf Cavalry
formations.units: One Wolf Lord Captain, four Thunderwolf Cavalry

formations.name: Wolf Guard Terminator Pack
formations.units: One Wolf Lord Captain, four Wolf Guard Terminators plus transport

formations.name: Wolf Scout Pack
formations.units: One Wolf Lord Captain, four Wolf Scouts plus transport

sections.name: Space Wolf Support Packs
sections.description: Two Support Packs may be taken per Hunting Pack (note: not one per Core Pack)

formations.name: Land Speeders
formations.units: Any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado

formations.name: Predators
formations.units: Four Predator Annihilators and/or Predator Destructors

sections.name: Space Wolf Navy & Collegia Titanica Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Warhounds
extraUnits: Add one additional Warhound Titan: 200 points

upgrades.title: Space Wolf Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per pack

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

items.name: Battle Barge
items.description: Replace the Strike Cruiser with a Battle Barge

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Dreadnoughts or one Wulfen Dreadnought to the formation

items.name: Fenrisian Wolves
items.description: Add up to two Fenrisian Wolves

items.name: Heavy Transports
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks or Land Raiders, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: 0-1 Supreme Commander
items.description: Replace a Wolf Lord Captain with a Great Wolf Supreme Commander
